name: 保健食品特論
description: 1. 瞭解食品除提供六大營養素之外，其他對健康有益的成分，作用機轉方式與近年研究證據。 2. 指導學生如何從事相關研究，如何判斷相關研究的可靠性。 3. 釐清市面傳說具特異功能的所有健康食品之可信度。
goals: Identify the basic principles and concepts of functional foods and nutraceuticals.
Discuss the role of selected functional foods and nutraceuticals in health and disease.
Be aware of the global regulatory issues pertaining to functional foods and nutraceuticals.
Identify specific research areas within functional foods and nutraceuticals.
Have improved oral communication and discussion skills
The student will be familiar with the research ethics.
